Caption: Figure 2: Geometry of the frame in the X-Y plane.
Mention:
The goal of this subsection is to derive unique 3D coordinates for the four frame corners given in 2D. Let the frame lie
in the X-Y plane in the world coordinate system as shown in fig. 2. For simplicity, let us express the geometry in terms of
an aspect ratio m and a shear η. Thus, the values in the paper are given by l = mh and s = ηh. The four 3D vertices (in
